NAME: [Battle of Changping](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Battle_of_Changping "Battle of Changping")
DESCRIPTION: Live burial of surrendered [State of Zhao](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/State_of_Zhao "State of Zhao") soldiers during Qin's wars of unification.

NAME: Xin'an massacre
DESCRIPTION: Live burial of surrendered [Qin dynasty](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Qin_dynasty "Qin dynasty") soldiers after the [Battle of Julu](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Battle_of_Julu "Battle of Julu").

NAME: [Asiatic Vespers](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asiatic_Vespers "Asiatic Vespers")
DESCRIPTION: Wholesale massacre of all [Roman](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roman_Republic "Roman Republic") and Italic citizens in Asia Minor, starting the [Mithridatic Wars](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mithridatic_Wars "Mithridatic Wars").

NAME: [Menai massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Menai_massacre "Menai massacre")
DESCRIPTION: [Gaius Suetonius Paulinus](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gaius_Suetonius_Paulinus "Gaius Suetonius Paulinus") ordered the Roman army to destroy the Celtic [Druid](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Druid "Druid") stronghold on Anglesey in Britain, sacking Druidic colleges and [sacred groves](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sacred_grove "Sacred grove"). The massacre helped impose Roman religion on Britain and sent Druidism into a decline from which it never recovered.

NAME: [Massacre of Xuzhou](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cao_Cao%27s_invasion_of_Xu_Province "Cao Cao's invasion of Xu Province")
DESCRIPTION: Warlord [Cao Cao](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cao_Cao "Cao Cao") invaded several cities of [Xu Province](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Xu_Province "Xu Province") after his father, [Cao Song](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cao_Song "Cao Song"), was killed in the province. Dead bodies of civilians blocked the [Si River](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Si_River "Si River").

NAME: [Massacre of Thessaloniki](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Massacre_of_Thessaloniki "Massacre of Thessaloniki") (1760)
DESCRIPTION: Emperor [Theodosius I](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Theodosius_I "Theodosius I") of Rome ordered the executions after the citizens of Thessaloniki murdered a top-level military commander during a violent protest against the arrest of a popular charioteer.

NAME: [Massacre of Banu Qurayza](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Invasion_of_Banu_Qurayza "Invasion of Banu Qurayza") (1956)
DESCRIPTION: [Muhammad](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Muhammad "Muhammad") ordered his followers to attack the Banu Qurayza because according to Muslim tradition he had been ordered to do so by the angel [Gabriel](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gabriel "Gabriel"). Muhammad had a treaty with the tribe which was betrayed. 600-900 members of the Banu Qurayza (all males old enough to have pubic hair, all of whom were non-combatants) were beheaded, while the women and children of the tribe were sold into slavery (Tabari, Ibn Ishaq). Al Waqidi influence is in [Ibn Ishaqs](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ibn_Ishaq "Ibn Ishaq") biography. [Stillman](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Norman_Stillman "Norman Stillman") and Watt deny the authenticity of al-Waqidi. Al-Waqidi has been frequently criticized by Muslim [Ulama](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ulama "Ulama"), who claim that he is unreliable. A reliable source says all the warriors were killed based on [Sa'd ibn Mu'adh](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sa%27d_ibn_Mu%27adh "Sa'd ibn Mu'adh") judgement whom was appointed by Banu Qurzaya for arbitration. 2 Muslims were killed

NAME: [Massacre of Verden](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Massacre_of_Verden "Massacre of Verden") (1830)
DESCRIPTION: [Charlemagne](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charlemagne "Charlemagne") ordered the massacre of 4,500 imprisoned rebel [pagan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Germanic_paganism "Germanic paganism") [Saxons](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Saxons "Saxons") in response to losing two envoys, four counts, and twenty nobles in battle with the Saxons during his campaign to conquer and [Christianize](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christianization "Christianization") the Saxons during the [Saxon Wars](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Saxon_Wars "Saxon Wars").

NAME: [St. Brice's Day massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/St._Brice%27s_Day_massacre "St. Brice's Day massacre") (1871)
DESCRIPTION: King [Æthelred II "the Unready"](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/%C3%86thelred_the_Unready "Æthelred the Unready") of England ordered all [Danes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Danes_(Germanic_tribe) "Danes (Germanic tribe)") living in England killed. The Danes were accused of aiding [Viking](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Viking "Viking") raiders. The King of Denmark, [Sweyn Forkbeard](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sweyn_Forkbeard "Sweyn Forkbeard"), invaded England and deposed King Ethelred in 1013.

NAME: [1033 Fez massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1033_Fez_massacre "1033 Fez massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Following their capture of the city of Fez from the [Maghrawa](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maghrawa "Maghrawa") tribal confederation, warriors of the [Zenata](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zenata "Zenata") [Berber](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Berbers "Berbers") [Banu Ifran](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Banu_Ifran "Banu Ifran") tribe slaughtered over 6,000 [Moroccan Jews](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Moroccan_Jews "Moroccan Jews").

NAME: [Massacre of the Jews of Granada](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1066_Granada_massacre "1066 Granada massacre") (1906)
DESCRIPTION: Apparently angered by a rumour that Jewish vizier [Joseph ibn Naghrela](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joseph_ibn_Naghrela "Joseph ibn Naghrela") intended to assassinate the king and take the throne for himself, a Muslim mob killed him and hung his body on a cross. The mob went on to kill the Jewish population of the city.

NAME: [Massacre of the Rhineland Jews](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rhineland_massacres "Rhineland massacres") (2015)
DESCRIPTION: Series of mass murders of Jews perpetrated by mobs of French and German Christians of the [People's Crusade](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/People%27s_Crusade "People's Crusade").

NAME: [Jerusalem Massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Siege_of_Jerusalem_(1099) "Siege of Jerusalem (1099)")
DESCRIPTION: The culminating massacre of the [First Crusade](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/First_Crusade "First Crusade"): Frankish expeditionary forces broke into [besieged Jerusalem](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Siege_of_Jerusalem_(1099) "Siege of Jerusalem (1099)") (then part of the [Fatimid Caliphate](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fatimid_Caliphate "Fatimid Caliphate")) and killed Muslims and Jews.

NAME: [Massacre of the Latins](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Massacre_of_the_Latins "Massacre of the Latins") (1789)
DESCRIPTION: Wholesale massacre of all Latin (Western European) inhabitants of Constantinople by a mob.

NAME: [Massacre at Béziers](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Massacre_at_B%C3%A9ziers "Massacre at Béziers")
DESCRIPTION: First major military action of the [Albigensian Crusade](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Albigensian_Crusade "Albigensian Crusade")

NAME: [Massacre of the French in Sicily](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sicilian_Vespers "Sicilian Vespers") (1695)
DESCRIPTION: Revolt against king [Charles I](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_I_of_Anjou "Charles I of Anjou"), starting the [War of the Sicilian Vespers](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/War_of_the_Sicilian_Vespers "War of the Sicilian Vespers")

NAME: [1349 Erfurt massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Erfurt_massacre_(1349) "Erfurt massacre (1349)")
DESCRIPTION: Against the backdrop of the [Black Death persecutions](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Persecution_of_Jews_during_the_Black_Death "Persecution of Jews during the Black Death"), members of Erfurt's Jewish community were lynched. Any survivors were expelled from the city.

LOCATION: Crow Creek Site, [Great Plains](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Great_Plains "Great Plains"), North America
NAME: [Crow Creek massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crow_Creek_massacre "Crow Creek massacre") (1978)
DESCRIPTION: Prehistoric massacre of Central Plains villagers in what is now South Dakota, involving scalping and dismemberment of the victims.

NAME: [Brussels massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brussels_massacre "Brussels massacre")
DESCRIPTION: When a clerical [usury](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Usury "Usury") scandal led to allegations of [host desecration](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Host_desecration "Host desecration"), multiple local Jews were executed or otherwise killed and the rest of the Jewish community was banished.

NAME: [Lisbon massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lisbon_massacre "Lisbon massacre")
DESCRIPTION: When a [New Christian](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/New_Christian "New Christian") expressed skepticism about an apparent miracle, he was dragged out of the [Church of São Domingos](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Igreja_de_S%C3%A3o_Domingos_(Lisbon) "Igreja de São Domingos (Lisbon)") and beaten to death by an enraged crowd. Afterwards, New Christians in general were scapegoated for drought and plague sweeping the country at the time. Encouraged by [seditionist](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sedition "Sedition") [Dominican](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dominican_Order "Dominican Order") friars, mobs of local townspeople and foreign sailors tortured and killed nearly 2,000 known or suspected New Christians for alleged [heresy](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heresy "Heresy") and [deicide](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Deicide "Deicide").

NAME: [Massacre in the Great Temple of Tenochtitlan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Massacre_in_the_Great_Temple_of_Tenochtitlan "Massacre in the Great Temple of Tenochtitlan")
DESCRIPTION: Spanish troops and [Tlaxcalan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tlaxcala_(Nahua_state) "Tlaxcala (Nahua state)") allies under the command of [conquistador](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conquistador "Conquistador") [Pedro de Alvarado](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pedro_de_Alvarado "Pedro de Alvarado") killed a large number of Aztec priests, nobles and warriors in the *[Templo Mayor](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Templo_Mayor "Templo Mayor")* for unclear reasons.

NAME: [Stockholm massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stockholm_Bloodbath "Stockholm Bloodbath") (1845)
DESCRIPTION: Days after his coronation in Stockholm, King [Christian II of Denmark](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christian_II_of_Denmark "Christian II of Denmark")-trying to maintain the [Kalmar Union](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kalmar_Union "Kalmar Union"), a personal union between Sweden, Norway and Denmark, and thus keep up his claims to the Swedish throne-liquidated nobles and bishops who earlier had opposed him, or who might stir up fresh opposition.

NAME: [Cajamarca massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Battle_of_Cajamarca "Battle of Cajamarca")
DESCRIPTION: The Battle of Cajamarca was the unexpected [ambush](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ambush "Ambush") and seizure of the [Inca](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Inca_Empire "Inca Empire") ruler [Atahualpa](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Atahualpa "Atahualpa") by a small Spanish force led by [Francisco Pizarro](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Francisco_Pizarro "Francisco Pizarro"), on November 16, 1532. The Spanish killed thousands of Atahualpa's counsellors, commanders and unarmed attendants in the great plaza of [Cajamarca](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cajamarca "Cajamarca"), and caused his armed host outside the town to flee. The capture of Atahualpa marked the opening stage of the conquest of the [pre-Columbian](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pre-Columbian "Pre-Columbian") Inca civilization of Peru.

NAME: [Mérindol massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/M%C3%A9rindol_massacre "Mérindol massacre")
DESCRIPTION: [Francis I of France](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Francis_I_of_France "Francis I of France") ordered that the [Waldensians](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Waldensians "Waldensians") of the village of Mérindol be punished for their dissident religious activities. Provençal and papal soldiers killed large numbers of Waldensian villagers.

NAME: [Massacre of Vassy](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Massacre_of_Vassy "Massacre of Vassy")
DESCRIPTION: The murder of [Huguenot](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Huguenots "Huguenots") worshipers and citizens in an armed action by troops of [Francis, Duke of Guise](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Francis,_Duke_of_Guise "Francis, Duke of Guise").

NAME: [Massacre of Sens](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Massacre_of_Sens "Massacre of Sens")
DESCRIPTION: French Catholics tied 100 French Huguenots to poles and drowned them in the [Yonne](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yonne_(river) "Yonne (river)").

NAME: [Cyprus massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cyprus_massacre "Cyprus massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Ottoman forces capturing Cyprus killed mostly [Greek](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Greek_people "Greek people") and [Armenian](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Armenian_people "Armenian people") Christian inhabitants.

NAME: [Massacre of Novgorod](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Massacre_of_Novgorod "Massacre of Novgorod")
DESCRIPTION: [Oprichniki](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oprichnik "Oprichnik") were unleashed upon the city of Novgorod by [Ivan the Terrible](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ivan_the_Terrible "Ivan the Terrible").

NAME: [Massacre of St. Bartholomew's Day](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/St._Bartholomew%27s_Day_massacre "St. Bartholomew's Day massacre") (1835)"Massacre at Paris" (1600)
DESCRIPTION: The French King's soldiers and subjects slaughtered [Huguenots](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Huguenots "Huguenots"); it was the first massacre to be labeled by that word in the English language.

NAME: [Clandeboye massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clandeboye_massacre "Clandeboye massacre")
DESCRIPTION: During a meeting between [The Earl of Essex](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Walter_Devereux,_1st_Earl_of_Essex "Walter Devereux, 1st Earl of Essex") and Sir [Brian McPhelim O'Neill](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brian_McPhelim_O%27Neill "Brian McPhelim O'Neill") at [Belfast Castle](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Belfast_Castle "Belfast Castle"), the English forces turned on the [O'Neills](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/O%27Neill_dynasty "O'Neill dynasty") and killed 200 of them.

NAME: [Massacre of Smerwick](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Siege_of_Smerwick "Siege of Smerwick") (1824)Smerwick massacre (1976)
DESCRIPTION: English troops commanded by Grey de Wilton massacred Papal invasion forces at Dun an Oir in West Kerry

LOCATION: [Junkersdorf](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Junkersdorf "Junkersdorf"), Holy Roman Empire (now part of [Cologne's Third District](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lindenthal,_Cologne "Lindenthal, Cologne"))
NAME: [Junkersdorf massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Junkersdorf_massacre "Junkersdorf massacre")
DESCRIPTION: During the [Cologne War](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cologne_War "Cologne War"), marauding soldiers in the employ of [prince-elector](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prince-elector "Prince-elector") Archbishop [Ernest of Bavaria](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ernest_of_Bavaria "Ernest of Bavaria") attacked a civilian convoy.

LOCATION: [Manila](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Manila "Manila"), [Captaincy General of the Philippines](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Captaincy_General_of_the_Philippines "Captaincy General of the Philippines")
NAME: [Chinese massacre of 1603](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sangley_Rebellion "Sangley Rebellion")
DESCRIPTION: Fearing an uprising by the large Chinese community in the Philippines, the Spanish colonists carried out a preemptive massacre, largely in the Manila area, in October 1603.

NAME: [Jamestown massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jamestown_massacre "Jamestown massacre")
DESCRIPTION: The [Powhatans](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Powhatans "Powhatans") killed 347 settlers, almost one-third of the English population of the Virginia colony.

NAME: [Fort Mystic massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fort_Mystic_massacre "Fort Mystic massacre") (1910)
DESCRIPTION: [Connecticut colonists](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Connecticut_Colony "Connecticut Colony") under the command of Captain John Mason and Narragansett and Mohegan allies set fire to a fortified Pequot village near the Mystic River.

LOCATION: [Luzon](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luzon "Luzon"), [Captaincy General of the Philippines](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Captaincy_General_of_the_Philippines "Captaincy General of the Philippines")
NAME: Chinese massacre of 1639 (1961)
DESCRIPTION: The Spanish and their Filipino allies carried out a large-scale massacre, in which 17,000 to 22,000 Chinese rebels died.

NAME: [Ulster massacres](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Irish_Rebellion_of_1641#Ulster_massacres "Irish Rebellion of 1641")
DESCRIPTION: The [Ulster Massacres](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Irish_Rebellion_of_1641#Ulster_Massacres "Irish Rebellion of 1641") were a series of massacres and resulting deaths amongst the ~40,000 Protestant settlers which took place in 1641 during the Irish Rebellion.

NAME: [Portadown massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portadown_massacre "Portadown massacre")
DESCRIPTION: The Portadown massacre took place in November 1641 at what is now [Portadown](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portadown "Portadown"), [County Armagh](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/County_Armagh "County Armagh"). Up to 100 mostly English [Protestants](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Protestantism "Protestantism") were killed in the [River Bann](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/River_Bann "River Bann") by a group of armed Irishmen. This was the biggest [massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Massacre "Massacre") of Protestant colonists during the [1641-42 uprising](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Irish_Rebellion_of_1641 "Irish Rebellion of 1641").

NAME: [Bolton massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bolton_massacre "Bolton massacre")
DESCRIPTION: [Royalist](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cavalier "Cavalier") forces killed many of the town's defenders and citizens.

NAME: [Yangzhou massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yangzhou_massacre "Yangzhou massacre")
DESCRIPTION: [Qing](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Qing "Qing") troops killed residents of Yangzhou as punishment for resistance

NAME: [Sichuan massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sichuan_massacre "Sichuan massacre")
DESCRIPTION: There is no reliable figure, but estimated 1 million out of 3 million [Sichuanese](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sichuanese_people "Sichuanese people") died mainly due to the massacre by army of [Zhang Xianzhong](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zhang_Xianzhong "Zhang Xianzhong").

NAME: [Batih massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Batih_massacre "Batih massacre")
DESCRIPTION: After the [Battle of Batih](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Battle_of_Batih "Battle of Batih"), [Zaporozhian Cossacks](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zaporozhian_Cossacks "Zaporozhian Cossacks") under the command of [Hetman](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hetman_of_Zaporizhian_Host "Hetman of Zaporizhian Host") [Bohdan Khmelnytsky](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bohdan_Khmelnytsky "Bohdan Khmelnytsky") carried out a mass execution of [Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polish%E2%80%93Lithuanian_Commonwealth "Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth") prisoners of war, horrifying even the Cossacks' own [Crimean Tatar](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crimean_Khanate "Crimean Khanate") allies.

NAME: [Dunoon massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dunoon_massacre "Dunoon massacre")
DESCRIPTION: The Clan Campbell after receiving requested hospitality according to custom, slaughtered their Lamont Clan hosts in their beds and threw their bodies down the well to poison the water should they have missed anyone.

NAME: [Lachine massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lachine_massacre "Lachine massacre")
DESCRIPTION: 1,500 [Mohawk](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mohawk_people "Mohawk people") warriors launch a surprise attack on the small (375 inhabitants) French settlement of Lachine, destroying a substantial portion of it and killing or capturing many of its inhabitants.

NAME: [Massacre of Glencoe](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Massacre_of_Glencoe "Massacre of Glencoe")
DESCRIPTION: Government soldiers, mainly from [Clan Campbell](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clan_Campbell "Clan Campbell"), killed members of the [Clan MacDonald of Glencoe](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clan_MacDonald_of_Glencoe "Clan MacDonald of Glencoe").

NAME: [Massacre of Hailuoto](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Massacre_of_Hailuoto "Massacre of Hailuoto")
DESCRIPTION: The [Cossacks](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cossacks "Cossacks") of the [Russian Empire](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russian_Empire "Russian Empire") killed inhabitants of the Hailuoto Island with axes during the [Great Wrath](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Great_Wrath "The Great Wrath") (part of the [Great Northern War](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Great_Northern_War "Great Northern War")).

NAME: [1740 Batavia massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1740_Batavia_massacre "1740 Batavia massacre")
DESCRIPTION: At least 10,000 [Chinese Indonesians](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chinese_Indonesians "Chinese Indonesians") in and near Batavia were slaughtered by members of other ethnic groups living in the area, in collaboration with Dutch soldiers.

NAME: [Penn's Creek massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Penn%27s_Creek_massacre "Penn's Creek massacre")
DESCRIPTION: A group of Indians attacked settlers on [Penn's Creek](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Penn%27s_Creek "Penn's Creek").

NAME: [Massacre of Uman](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Massacre_of_Uman "Massacre of Uman")
DESCRIPTION: During the [Koliivshchyna](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Koliivshchyna "Koliivshchyna"), a [Haydamak](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Haydamak "Haydamak") rebel leader named [Maksym Zalizniak](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maksym_Zalizniak "Maksym Zalizniak") ordered the slaughter of many civilians in the town of Uman, with priority given to targeting Poles, Jews and [Uniates](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ruthenian_Uniate_Church "Ruthenian Uniate Church").

NAME: [Massacre of St George's Fields](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Massacre_of_St_George%27s_Fields "Massacre of St George's Fields")
DESCRIPTION: British troops fired at a mob that was protesting at the imprisonment of [John Wilkes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Wilkes "John Wilkes"), whose crime was criticizing [King George III](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/King_George_III "King George III").

NAME: [Boston Massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Boston_Massacre "Boston Massacre")
DESCRIPTION: British troops fired at a mob of colonists. This helped spark the [American Revolution](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/American_Revolution "American Revolution") even though an all-colonist jury found the soldiers innocent.

NAME: [Bloody Falls massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bloody_Falls_massacre "Bloody Falls massacre")
DESCRIPTION: [Chipewyan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chipewyan "Chipewyan") warriors attacked an [Inuit](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Inuit "Inuit") camp, killing men, women and children.

NAME: [Baylor Massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Baylor_Massacre "Baylor Massacre")
DESCRIPTION: British infantry troops attacked sleeping Continental Light Dragoons using bayonets.

NAME: [Little Egg Harbor massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Affair_at_Little_Egg_Harbor "The Affair at Little Egg Harbor")
DESCRIPTION: British loyalists bayonetted Continental Light Dragoons as they slept.

NAME: [Cherry Valley massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cherry_Valley_massacre "Cherry Valley massacre")
DESCRIPTION: A mixed force of [Loyalists](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Loyalist_(American_Revolution) "Loyalist (American Revolution)"), British soldiers, and [Iroquois](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Iroquois "Iroquois") of the [Mohawk](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mohawk_people "Mohawk people") and [Seneca](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seneca_people "Seneca people") tribes descended upon the town of Cherry Valley. They slaughtered 14 of the town's defenders and 30 noncombatants.

NAME: [Waxhaw massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Waxhaw_massacre "Waxhaw massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Loyalist troops under the command of British Colonel [Banastre Tarleton](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Banastre_Tarleton "Banastre Tarleton") slashed and bayoneted fallen American troops during the late stages of the [Battle of Waxhaws](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Battle_of_Waxhaws "Battle of Waxhaws"). Conflicting contemporary accounts claim violation of an American [white flag](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/White_flag "White flag") by one or the other of the sides involved.

NAME: [Sugarloaf massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sugarloaf_massacre "Sugarloaf massacre")
DESCRIPTION: A group of loyalists and Indians during the American Revolutionary War led by Roland Montour attacked a group of American soldiers.

NAME: [Pyle's Massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pyle%27s_Massacre "Pyle's Massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Patriot militia leader Colonel Henry Lee deceived Loyalist militia under Dr. John Pyle into thinking he was British commander Banastre Tarleton sent to meet them. Lee's men then opened fire, surprising and scattering Pyle's force.

NAME: [Zong massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zong_massacre "Zong massacre")
DESCRIPTION: In order to claim on insurance, 132 to 142 African slaves were thrown overboard by the crew of the British [slave ship](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Slave_ship "Slave ship") *Zong* when potable water ran low.

NAME: [Gnadenhutten massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gnadenhutten_massacre "Gnadenhutten massacre")(Moravian massacre)
DESCRIPTION: Pennsylvania militia men attacked a Moravian mission and killed 96 peaceful Christian American Indians there in retaliation for unrelated deaths of several white Pennsylvanians.

NAME: [Olowalu Massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Olowalu_Massacre "Olowalu Massacre")
DESCRIPTION: In retribution for several thefts, [maritime fur traders](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maritime_fur_trade "Maritime fur trade") under the command of [Simon Metcalfe](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Simon_Metcalfe "Simon Metcalfe") fired cannons at the approaching canoes of [Native Hawaiian](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Native_Hawaiians "Native Hawaiians") villagers.

NAME: [Champ de Mars massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Champ_de_Mars_massacre "Champ de Mars massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Soldiers of the [French National Guard](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/National_Guard_(France) "National Guard (France)") fire into a crowd of republican protesters.

NAME: [September Massacres](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/September_Massacres "September Massacres")
DESCRIPTION: Popular courts in the [French Revolution](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/French_Revolution "French Revolution") sentenced prisoners to death, including around 240 priests.

NAME: [First Massacre of Machecoul](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/First_Massacre_of_Machecoul "First Massacre of Machecoul")
DESCRIPTION: [Vendean](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vend%C3%A9e "Vendée") peasants angered at [mass conscription](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lev%C3%A9e_en_masse "Levée en masse") and the [Civil Constitution of the Clergy](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Civil_Constitution_of_the_Clergy "Civil Constitution of the Clergy") slaughtered many republican troops and officials, along with locals believed to be supporters of the [republic](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/French_First_Republic "French First Republic").

NAME: [Avranches massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Avranches_massacre "Avranches massacre")
DESCRIPTION: [Catholic and Royal Army](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Catholic_and_Royal_Army "Catholic and Royal Army") prisoners of war, and later suspected counterrevolutionaries and royalist sympathizers, were murdered by republican troops.

NAME: [Massacre of Praga](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Battle_of_Praga "Battle of Praga")
DESCRIPTION: Inhabitants of the [Warsaw](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Warsaw "Warsaw") district [Praga](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Praga "Praga") were massacred by pillaging Russian troops following the [Battle of Praga](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Battle_of_Praga "Battle of Praga").

NAME: [1804 Haiti massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1804_Haiti_massacre "1804 Haiti massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Massacre of French people in Haiti.

NAME: [Boyd massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Boyd_massacre "Boyd massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Whangaroa Māori killed and ate 66 crew and passengers on board the *[Boyd](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Boyd_(1783_ship) "Boyd (1783 ship)")*.

LOCATION: Near [Bay Minette, Alabama](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bay_Minette,_Alabama "Bay Minette, Alabama"), United States
NAME: [Fort Mims massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fort_Mims_massacre "Fort Mims massacre")
DESCRIPTION: A force of [Creek Indians](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Muscogee "Muscogee") belonging to the [Red Sticks](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Red_Sticks "Red Sticks") stormed and captured Fort Mims, then killed almost all of the surviving pro-American natives, [métis](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/M%C3%A9tis "Métis") people, white settlers, slaves, and militia still inside it.

NAME: [Madulla](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Madulla "Madulla") massacre
DESCRIPTION: British troops killed 22 unarmed native civilians who were hiding in a cave.

NAME: Uva-Wellassa massacre
DESCRIPTION: During the suppression of the 1818 [Uva-Wellassa uprising](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Great_Rebellion_of_1817%E2%80%9318 "Great Rebellion of 1817-18") (also known as the Great Rebellion) [Sir Robert Brownrigg](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Brownrigg "Robert Brownrigg") ordered that all males between 15 and 60 years in the [Uva-Wellassa region](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Uva_Province "Uva Province") to be driven out, exiled or killed.

NAME: [Peterloo Massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peterloo_Massacre "Peterloo Massacre")
DESCRIPTION: [Manchester and Salford Yeomanry](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Manchester_and_Salford_Yeomanry "Manchester and Salford Yeomanry") charged a meeting of 60,000-80,000 people campaigning for reform of parliamentary representation.

NAME: [Constantinople Massacre of 1821](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Constantinople_Massacre_of_1821 "Constantinople Massacre of 1821")
DESCRIPTION: Hundreds of Greeks were massacred by the Ottomans, including the Greek patriarch, bishops and officials.

NAME: [Navarino massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Navarino_massacre "Navarino massacre")
DESCRIPTION: The whole Turkish population of Navarino, which was around 3000, were killed by Greeks.

NAME: [Chios massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chios_massacre "Chios massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Tens of thousands of [Greeks](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Greeks "Greeks") on the island of [Chios](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chios "Chios") were slaughtered by [Ottoman](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ottoman_Empire "Ottoman Empire") troops in 1822.

NAME: [Naousa massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Naousa_massacre "Naousa massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Greek civilians were slaughtered by Ottoman Empire.

NAME: [Kasos massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kasos_Massacre "Kasos Massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Ottoman-Egyptian army slaughtered Greek civilians

NAME: [Massacre of Salsipuedes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Massacre_of_Salsipuedes "Massacre of Salsipuedes")
DESCRIPTION: Uruguayan army under command of president [Fructuoso Rivera](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fructuoso_Rivera "Fructuoso Rivera") slaughtered the last remains of the indigenous [Charrua People](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charrua_people "Charrua people"), survivors were sent into a forced walk and then sold into slavery.

NAME: [Cutthroat Gap massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cutthroat_Gap_massacre "Cutthroat Gap massacre")
DESCRIPTION: A group of [Osage](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Osage_Nation "Osage Nation") warriors charged into a [Kiowa](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kiowa "Kiowa") camp and brutally slaughtered everyone there, including children.

NAME: [Dade massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dade_massacre "Dade massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Two U.S. Army companies under the command of Major Francis L. Dade were marching from [Fort Brooke](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fort_Brooke "Fort Brooke") (Tampa) to [Fort King](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fort_King "Fort King") (Ocala) when they were attacked by about 200 [Seminoles](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seminoles "Seminoles"). One hundred and eight soldiers were killed; only two men from the command survived.

NAME: [Goliad massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Goliad_massacre "Goliad massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Around 400 [Texians](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Texians "Texians") killed by Santa Anna's Mexican Army [Presidio la Bahia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Presidio_la_Bahia "Presidio la Bahia") [Goliad](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Goliad "Goliad") Palm Sunday March 27, 1836.

NAME: [Waterloo Creek massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Waterloo_Creek_massacre "Waterloo Creek massacre")
DESCRIPTION: [Aboriginal Australians](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aboriginal_Australians "Aboriginal Australians") killed by a force of colonial mounted police.

NAME: [Piet Retief Delegation massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Piet_Retief_Delegation_massacre "Piet Retief Delegation massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Under the orders of [Dingane kaSenzangakhona](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dingane_kaSenzangakhona "Dingane kaSenzangakhona"), a [Voortrekker](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Great_Trek "Great Trek") delegation led by [Piet Retief](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Piet_Retief "Piet Retief") was seized during land treaty negotiations and taken to the Kwa-Matiwane hillside, where its members and their servants were summarily executed.

LOCATION: Around the area of what is now [Weenen](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Weenen "Weenen"), [KwaZulu-Natal](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/KwaZulu-Natal "KwaZulu-Natal"), [Zulu Kingdom](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zulu_Kingdom "Zulu Kingdom")
NAME: [Weenen massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Weenen_massacre "Weenen massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Zulu [impis](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Impi "Impi") sent by Dingane attacked and slaughtered [Khoikhoi](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Khoekhoe "Khoekhoe"), [Basuto](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sotho_people "Sotho people") and [Voortrekkers](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Great_Trek "Great Trek") who were camped at multiple sites.

NAME: [Myall Creek massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Myall_Creek_massacre "Myall Creek massacre")
DESCRIPTION: A posse (which was mostly white, but included a black African) killed [Aboriginal Australians](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aboriginal_Australians "Aboriginal Australians"). The perpetrators were convicted and sentenced to death.

NAME: [Bad Axe Massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Battle_of_Bad_Axe "Battle of Bad Axe")
DESCRIPTION: 150 [Sauk](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sauk_people "Sauk people") and [Meskwaki](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Meskwaki "Meskwaki") killed by the [U.S. Army](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States_Army "United States Army")

NAME: [Killough massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Killough_massacre "Killough massacre")
DESCRIPTION: In the largest attack by Native Americans on white settlers in Texas, a disaffected band of Cherokee, Caddo, Coushatta, and perhaps other ethnicities formed a war party and killed 18 members of the extended Killough family, who had settled in the area after the Senate of the Republic of Texas nullified the (land) treaty which President Sam Houston had negotiated with the Cherokee.

NAME: [Haun's Mill massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Haun%27s_Mill_massacre "Haun's Mill massacre")
DESCRIPTION: About 240 [Livingston County](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Livingston_County,_Missouri "Livingston County, Missouri") Missouri Regulators, [Missouri State militiamen](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Missouri_Volunteer_Militia "Missouri Volunteer Militia") and anti-Mormon volunteers killed 18 [Mormons](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mormons "Mormons") and one non-Mormon friend.

NAME: [Gippsland massacres](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gippsland_massacres "Gippsland massacres")
DESCRIPTION: A series of massacres spanning several years: 1840 - Nuntin, 1840 - Boney Point, 1841 - Butchers Creek - 30-35, 1841 - [Maffra](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maffra "Maffra"), 1842 - [Skull Creek](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Skull_Creek_massacre "Skull Creek massacre"), 1842 - Bruthen Creek - "hundreds killed", 1843 - [Warrigal Creek](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Warrigal_Creek "Warrigal Creek") - between 60 and 180 shot, 1844 - Maffra, 1846 - South [Gippsland](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gippsland "Gippsland") - 14 killed, 1846 - [Snowy River](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Snowy_River "Snowy River") - 8 killed, 1846-47 - Central [Gippsland](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gippsland "Gippsland") - 50 or more shot, 1850 - East [Gippsland](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gippsland "Gippsland") - 15-20 killed, 1850 - Murrindal - 16 poisoned, 1850 - Brodribb River - 15-20 killed. See also [Angus McMillan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Angus_McMillan "Angus McMillan").

NAME: [Massacre of Elphinstone's army](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Massacre_of_Elphinstone%27s_army "Massacre of Elphinstone's army")
DESCRIPTION: Afghan tribes massacred [Elphinstone](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_George_Keith_Elphinstone "William George Keith Elphinstone")'s British army including some 12,000 civilians.

NAME: [Pottawatomie massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pottawatomie_massacre "Pottawatomie massacre")
DESCRIPTION: In retaliation for the [Sacking of Lawrence](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sacking_of_Lawrence "Sacking of Lawrence") by proslavery settlers, [John Brown](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Brown_(abolitionist) "John Brown (abolitionist)") led a band of abolitionist settlers-including some members of the [Pottawatomie Rifles](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pottawatomie_Rifles "Pottawatomie Rifles")-in a massacre of five proslavery settlers north of Pottawatomie Creek.

NAME: [Crabb massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crabb_massacre "Crabb massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Mexican rebels fought American rebels at Caborca, Sonora. Out of less than ninety Americans, about thirty were killed in battle and the rest were executed by the Mexicans.

NAME: [Mountain Meadows massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mountain_Meadows_massacre "Mountain Meadows massacre")
DESCRIPTION: [Mormon militia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mormon_militia "Mormon militia"), some dressed as Indians, and [Paiute](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Southern_Paiute "Southern Paiute") tribesmen killed and plundered unarmed members of the [Baker-Fancher](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Baker-Fancher_party "Baker-Fancher party") emigrant [wagon train](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wagon_train "Wagon train").

NAME: [Marais des Cygnes massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marais_des_Cygnes_massacre "Marais des Cygnes massacre")
DESCRIPTION: [Proslavery](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proslavery "Proslavery") leader Charles Hamilton and about 30 men under his command capture 11 [Free-Staters](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Free-Stater_(Kansas) "Free-Stater (Kansas)") from Kansas and takes them to a defile in, where they begin shooting at them. Five of the prisoners are killed, and another five are severely wounded.

LOCATION: [Gallinas Mountains](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cibola_National_Forest "Cibola National Forest"), [Confederate Arizona](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Confederate_Arizona "Confederate Arizona") (present-day [Lincoln County](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lincoln_County,_New_Mexico "Lincoln County, New Mexico"), [New Mexico](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/New_Mexico "New Mexico")), [Confederate States of America](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Confederate_States_of_America "Confederate States of America")
NAME: [Gallinas massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gallinas_massacre "Gallinas massacre")
DESCRIPTION: A war party of [Mescalero](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mescalero "Mescalero") [Apache](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Apache "Apache") attacked a small group of Confederate soldiers, killing three of them.

NAME: [Nueces massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nueces_massacre "Nueces massacre")
DESCRIPTION: [German Texans](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/German_Texan "German Texan") trying to flee to Mexico to avoid being drafted into the [Confederate Army](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Confederate_States_Army "Confederate States Army") were attacked by Confederate soldiers.

LOCATION: [Madison County, North Carolina](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Madison_County,_North_Carolina "Madison County, North Carolina"), United States
NAME: [Shelton Laurel massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shelton_Laurel_massacre "Shelton Laurel massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Thirteen boys and men, accused of being Union sympathizers and spies, were summarily executed by members of the 64th North Carolina Regiment of the [Confederate Army](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Confederate_Army "Confederate Army").

LOCATION: [Washington Territory](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Washington_Territory "Washington Territory") near present day [Preston, Idaho](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Preston,_Idaho "Preston, Idaho") United States
NAME: [Bear River massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bear_River_massacre "Bear River massacre")
DESCRIPTION: [3rd Regiment California Volunteer Infantry](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/3rd_Regiment_California_Volunteer_Infantry "3rd Regiment California Volunteer Infantry") destroyed a village of [Shoshone](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shoshone "Shoshone") in southeastern Idaho.

NAME: [Lawrence massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lawrence_massacre "Lawrence massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Pro-[Confederate](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Confederate_States_of_America "Confederate States of America") [bushwhackers](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bushwhacker "Bushwhacker") known as [Quantrill's Raiders](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quantrill%27s_Raiders "Quantrill's Raiders") attacked the town of [Lawrence, Kansas](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lawrence,_Kansas "Lawrence, Kansas") during the [American Civil War](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/American_Civil_War "American Civil War") in retaliation for the Union attack on [Osceola, Missouri](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Osceola,_Missouri "Osceola, Missouri").

NAME: [Fort Pillow massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fort_Pillow_massacre "Fort Pillow massacre")
DESCRIPTION: After their surrender following the Battle of Fort Pillow, most of the Union garrison-consisting primarily of black troops-as well as civilians, including women and children, were massacred by Confederate forces under the command of General [Nathan Bedford Forrest](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nathan_Bedford_Forrest "Nathan Bedford Forrest").

NAME: [Sand Creek massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sand_Creek_massacre "Sand Creek massacre")
DESCRIPTION: [Colorado Territory](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Colorado_Territory "Colorado Territory") 90-day [militia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Militia "Militia") destroyed a peaceful village of [Cheyenne](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cheyenne "Cheyenne") and [Arapaho](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arapaho "Arapaho") on the eastern plains.

NAME: [American Ranch massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/American_Ranch_massacre "American Ranch massacre")
DESCRIPTION: [Cheyenne](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cheyenne "Cheyenne") and [Sioux](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sioux "Sioux") warriors attacked a ranch and killed eight people, three of them [cowboys](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cowboy "Cowboy").

NAME: [Washita Massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Washita_Massacre "Washita Massacre") (1938)
DESCRIPTION: Lt. Col. [G. A. Custer](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Armstrong_Custer "George Armstrong Custer")'s 7th cavalry attacked a village of sleeping [Cheyenne](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cheyenne "Cheyenne") led by [Black Kettle](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Black_Kettle "Black Kettle"). Custer reported 103-later revised to 140-warriors, "some" women and "few" children killed, and 53 women and children taken hostage. Other casualty estimates by cavalry members, scouts and Indians vary widely, with the number of men killed ranging as low as 11 and the numbers of women and children ranging as high as 75. Before returning to their base, the cavalry killed several hundred Indian ponies and burned the village.

NAME: [Tianjin Massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tianjin_Massacre "Tianjin Massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Attacks on French Catholic priests and nuns, violent belligerence from French diplomats, and armed foreign intervention in [Tianjin](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tianjin "Tianjin").

NAME: [Chinese massacre of 1871](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chinese_massacre_of_1871 "Chinese massacre of 1871")
DESCRIPTION: A mob of over 500 men entered Chinatown in Los Angeles, rioted, ransacked, then tortured and killed 18 Chinese-Americans, making this among the largest mass lynchings in American history.

NAME: [Cypress Hills Massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cypress_Hills_Massacre "Cypress Hills Massacre")
DESCRIPTION: A group of American and Canadian [wolfers](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wolfers_(hunting) "Wolfers (hunting)") got into a dispute with some [Assiniboine](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Assiniboine "Assiniboine") warriors over a missing horse. Violence broke out in unclear circumstances, causing the deaths of thirteen Assiniboine.

NAME: [Massacre Canyon](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Massacre_Canyon "Massacre Canyon")
DESCRIPTION: A [Lakota](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lakota_people "Lakota people") war party attacked a band of [Pawnee](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pawnees "Pawnees") during their summer buffalo hunt, with many victims mutilated and some set on fire. The victims were mostly women and children.

NAME: [Batak massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Batak_massacre "Batak massacre")
DESCRIPTION: [Ottoman army irregulars](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bashi-bazouk "Bashi-bazouk") killed [Bulgarian](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bulgarians "Bulgarians") civilians barricaded in Batak's church.

NAME: [Frog Lake Massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frog_Lake_Massacre "Frog Lake Massacre")
DESCRIPTION: [Cree](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cree "Cree") warriors, dissatisfied with the lack of support from the [Canadian Government](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Government_of_Canada "Government of Canada") for [Treaty Indians](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Treaty_Indian "Treaty Indian"), and exacerbated by food shortages resulting from the near-extinction of bison, killed nine white settlers, including Indian agent Thomas Quinn.

NAME: [Rock Springs massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rock_Springs_massacre "Rock Springs massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Rioting white immigrant miners killed 28 Chinese miners, wounded 15, and 75 Chinese homes burned.

NAME: [Thibodaux massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thibodaux_massacre "Thibodaux massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Members of white [paramilitary](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paramilitary "Paramilitary") groups attack striking black sugar cane planation workers.

LOCATION: [St. Lucie County, Florida](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/St._Lucie_County,_Florida "St. Lucie County, Florida"), [United States](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States "United States")
NAME: [Jim Jumper massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jim_Jumper_massacre "Jim Jumper massacre")
DESCRIPTION: At a [Seminole](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seminole "Seminole") camp northeast of [Lake Okeechobee](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lake_Okeechobee "Lake Okeechobee"), a biracial (half-black, half-Native American) man named Jim Jumper shot and killed several Seminole for unclear reasons before being killed himself by a Seminole man named Billy Martin.

LOCATION: [Wounded Knee, South Dakota](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wounded_Knee,_South_Dakota "Wounded Knee, South Dakota"), United States
NAME: [Wounded Knee Massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wounded_Knee_Massacre "Wounded Knee Massacre")
DESCRIPTION: The U.S. 7th Cavalry intercepted a band of [Lakota people](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lakota_people "Lakota people") on their way to the Pine Ridge Reservation for shelter from the winter; as they were disarming them, a gun was fired, and the soldiers turned their artillery on the Lakota, killing men, women and children.

NAME: [Massacre of Italians at Aigues-Mortes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Massacre_of_Italians_at_Aigues-Mortes "Massacre of Italians at Aigues-Mortes")
DESCRIPTION: Italian immigrant workers were attacked by French villagers and [laborers](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blue-collar_worker "Blue-collar worker").

NAME: [Hamidian massacres](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hamidian_massacres "Hamidian massacres")
DESCRIPTION: Sultan [Abdul Hamid II](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Abdul_Hamid_II "Abdul Hamid II") ordered Ottoman forces to kill [Armenians](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Armenian_people "Armenian people") across the empire.

NAME: [Kucheng massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kucheng_massacre "Kucheng massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Members of a [Chinese cult](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chinese_religions_of_fasting "Chinese religions of fasting") attacked British missionaries, killing eleven people and destroying two houses.

NAME: [Lattimer massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lattimer_massacre "Lattimer massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Unarmed striking miners were shot in the back: many were wounded and 19 were killed.

NAME: [Mazocoba massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mazocoba_massacre "Mazocoba massacre")
DESCRIPTION: [Mexican Army](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mexican_Army "Mexican Army") troops attack [Yaqui](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yaqui_people "Yaqui people") hostiles west of Guaymas, [Sonora](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sonora "Sonora"), Mexico.

LOCATION: [Blagoveshchensk](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blagoveshchensk "Blagoveshchensk") and [Sixty-Four Villages East of the River](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sixty-Four_Villages_East_of_the_River "Sixty-Four Villages East of the River")
NAME: [Blagoveshchensk massacre and Sixty-Four Villages East of the River massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blagoveshchensk_massacre_and_Sixty-Four_Villages_East_of_the_River_massacre "Blagoveshchensk massacre and Sixty-Four Villages East of the River massacre")
DESCRIPTION: The [Russian Empire](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russian_Empire "Russian Empire") invaded the two cities ruled by the [Qing Dynasty](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Qing_Dynasty "Qing Dynasty"). A total of 7,000 innocent Chinese civilians were killed in the massacres.

NAME: [Leliefontein massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leliefontein_massacre "Leliefontein massacre")
DESCRIPTION: During the [Second Boer War](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Second_Boer_War "Second Boer War"), [Boer](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Boer "Boer") forces under [Manie Maritz](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Manie_Maritz "Manie Maritz") massacred 35 [Khoikhoi](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Khoikhoi "Khoikhoi") for being British sympathisers.

NAME: [Moro Crater massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Moro_Crater_massacre "Moro Crater massacre")
DESCRIPTION: A [U.S. Army](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/U.S._Army "U.S. Army") force of 540 soldiers under the command of [Major General](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Major_General "Major General") [Leonard Wood](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leonard_Wood "Leonard Wood"), accompanied by a naval detachment and with a detachment of native constabulary, armed with [artillery](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Artillery "Artillery") and small [firearms](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Firearms "Firearms"), attacked a Muslim village hidden in the crater of a [dormant volcano](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dormant_volcano "Dormant volcano").

NAME: [Atlanta massacre of 1906](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Atlanta_massacre_of_1906 "Atlanta massacre of 1906")
DESCRIPTION: White on black violence

NAME: [Santa María School massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Santa_Mar%C3%ADa_School_massacre "Santa María School massacre")
DESCRIPTION: A massacre of striking workers, mostly [saltpeter](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Saltpeter "Saltpeter") (nitrate) miners, along with wives and children, committed by the [Chilean Army](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chilean_Army "Chilean Army") in [Iquique](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Iquique "Iquique"), [Chile](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chile "Chile"). It occurred during the peak of the nitrate mining era, which coincided with the Parliamentary Period in Chilean political history (1891-1925). With the massacre and an ensuing reign of terror, not only was the strike broken, but the workers' movement was thrown into limbo for over a decade.

NAME: [Adana massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adana_massacre "Adana massacre")
DESCRIPTION: In April 1909, a religious-ethnic clash in the city of [Adana](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adana "Adana"), amidst [governmental upheaval](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/31_March_Incident "31 March Incident"), resulted in a series of anti-Armenian [pogroms](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pogrom "Pogrom") throughout the district, resulting in an estimated 15,000 to 30,000 deaths.

NAME: [Slocum massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Slocum_massacre "Slocum massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Armed white mobs massacred black residents of the town of [Slocum, Texas](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Slocum,_Texas "Slocum, Texas").

LOCATION: territories occupied by Serbia, especially in the regions of today's [Kosovo](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kosovo "Kosovo"), Western [Macedonia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republic_of_Macedonia "Republic of Macedonia") and Northern [Albania](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Albania "Albania")
NAME: [Massacres of Albanians in the Balkan Wars](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Massacres_of_Albanians_in_the_Balkan_Wars "Massacres of Albanians in the Balkan Wars")
DESCRIPTION: Series of mass murders of Albanian civilians perpetrated by the Montenegrin and Serbian armies.

NAME: [Lena massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lena_massacre "Lena massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Striking [gold miners](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gold_mining "Gold mining") were shot at by Russian troops while marching.

NAME: [Ludlow massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ludlow_massacre "Ludlow massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Twenty people, 11 of them children, died during an attack by the [Colorado National Guard](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Colorado_National_Guard "Colorado National Guard") on a tent colony of 1,200 striking coal miners and their families at Ludlow, Colorado. The event led to wider conflict quelled only by Federal troops sent in by U.S. President Woodrow Wilson.

NAME: [Abschwangen massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Abschwangen_massacre "Abschwangen massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Soldiers of the [Imperial Russian Army](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Imperial_Russian_Army "Imperial Russian Army") summarily executed 65 German civilians (including 28 locals and 37 refugees from southern East Prussia) in retaliation for a German cavalry reconnaissance unit killing a Russian officer who happened to be a member of the [Trubetskoy family](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trubetskoy_family "Trubetskoy family").

NAME: [1918 Porvenir massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Porvenir_massacre_(1918) "Porvenir massacre (1918)")
DESCRIPTION: In retaliation for the [Brite Ranch raid](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brite_Ranch_raid "Brite Ranch raid"), [Texas Rangers](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Texas_Ranger_Division "Texas Ranger Division"), soldiers of the [8th Cavalry Regiment](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/8th_Cavalry_Regiment "8th Cavalry Regiment") and local ranchers killed unarmed [Mexican Americans](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mexican_Americans "Mexican Americans").

NAME: [Vyborg massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vyborg_massacre "Vyborg massacre")
DESCRIPTION: At least 360 mostly Russian military personnel and civilians were killed after the [Finnish Civil War](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Finnish_Civil_War "Finnish Civil War") [Battle of Vyborg](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Battle_of_Vyborg "Battle of Vyborg") by the [Finnish Whites](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/White_Finland "White Finland"). The victims include a large number of other nationalities which the Whites presumed as Russians. The killed were not affiliated with the [Reds](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Red_Guards_(Finland) "Red Guards (Finland)"), but most were even White supporters. Also 450-1,200 captured Finnish Red Guard fighters were executed.

NAME: [Pinsk massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pinsk_massacre "Pinsk massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Soldiers of the [Polish Land Forces](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polish_Land_Forces "Polish Land Forces") under the command of General [Antoni Listowski](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Antoni_Listowski "Antoni Listowski") killed a group of Jews for holding an "illegal meeting".

NAME: [Jallianwala Bagh massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jallianwala_Bagh_massacre "Jallianwala Bagh massacre")
DESCRIPTION: 90 [British Indian Army](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/British_Indian_Army "British Indian Army") soldiers, led by Brigadier [Reginald Dyer](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Reginald_Dyer "Reginald Dyer"), opened fire on an unarmed gathering of men, women and children. The firing lasted for 10 to 15 minutes, until they ran out of ammunition.

NAME: [Menemen massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Menemen_massacre "Menemen massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Greek troops and local Greeks massacred Turks.

NAME: [Elaine massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elaine_massacre "Elaine massacre")
DESCRIPTION: White mobs slaughtered between 100 and 237 black people along with 5 white people.

NAME: [Washington State Centralia massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Centralia_massacre_(Washington) "Centralia massacre (Washington)")
DESCRIPTION: A conflict breaks out between members of the [Industrial Workers of the World](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Industrial_Workers_of_the_World "Industrial Workers of the World") and the [American Legion](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/American_Legion "American Legion") on the first anniversary of [Armistice Day](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Armistice_Day "Armistice Day") in unclear circumstances, killing one Wobbly and five Legionnaires.

NAME: [Yalova Peninsula massacres](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yalova_Peninsula_massacres "Yalova Peninsula massacres")
DESCRIPTION: Local Muslims of the peninsula were massacred by Greek troops, local Greeks, Armenians and [Circassians](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Circassians "Circassians").

NAME: [Gando massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gando_massacre "Gando massacre")
DESCRIPTION: After the [Hunchun incident](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hunchun_incident "Hunchun incident"), soldiers of the [Imperial Japanese Army](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Imperial_Japanese_Army "Imperial Japanese Army") murdered thousands of Korean civilians.

NAME: [Ocoee massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ocoee_massacre "Ocoee massacre")
DESCRIPTION: On election day, to stop "niggers" from voting, many local blacks were attacked by white mobs. The black population of Ocoee was forced to leave.

NAME: [Croke Park massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Croke_Park_massacre "Croke Park massacre")
DESCRIPTION: British Auxiliary police and [Black and Tans](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Black_and_Tans "Black and Tans") fired at [Gaelic football](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gaelic_football "Gaelic football") spectators at [Croke Park](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Croke_Park "Croke Park").

NAME: [Tulsa race massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tulsa_race_massacre "Tulsa race massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Mobs of white residents attacked black residents and businesses of the [Greenwood](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Greenwood,_Tulsa "Greenwood, Tulsa") District in [Tulsa](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tulsa "Tulsa"), [Oklahoma](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oklahoma "Oklahoma").

NAME: [Perry massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Perry_massacre "Perry massacre")
DESCRIPTION: White on black violence

NAME: [Rosewood massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rosewood_massacre "Rosewood massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Several days of violence by white mobs, ranging in size up to 400 people, resulted in the deaths of six blacks and two whites and the destruction of the town of Rosewood, which was abandoned after the incident.

NAME: [Kantō Massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kant%C5%8D_Massacre "Kantō Massacre")
DESCRIPTION: In the aftermath of the [1923 Great Kantō earthquake](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1923_Great_Kant%C5%8D_earthquake "1923 Great Kantō earthquake"), Japanese soldiers and police officers, along with vigilantes, slaughtered at least six thousand [Japanese Koreans](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Koreans_in_Japan "Koreans in Japan") and left-wing political dissidents.

NAME: [Napalpí massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Napalp%C3%AD_massacre "Napalpí massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Argentine police officers and ranchers killed hundreds of [Toba people](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Toba_people "Toba people") in retaliation for the murder of a French immigrant.

NAME: [Hanapepe massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hanapepe_massacre "Hanapepe massacre")
DESCRIPTION: A dispute between officers of the [Kauai County Police Department](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kauai_County_Police_Department "Kauai County Police Department") and striking [Visayan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Visayans "Visayans") sugar workers over the kidnapping of two [Ilocano](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ilocano_people "Ilocano people") strikebreakers escalated into a violent exchange that killed 16 strikers and four cops.

NAME: [Shaji massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shaji_massacre "Shaji massacre")
DESCRIPTION: A group of strikers in Canton, China, in support of a workers' strike in Hong Kong, were fired upon by British and French troops, who claimed to have been provoked by gunfire. Over 200 casualties resulted.

NAME: [Shanghai massacre of 1925](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/May_Thirtieth_Movement "May Thirtieth Movement")
DESCRIPTION: Members of the [Shanghai Municipal Police](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shanghai_Municipal_Police "Shanghai Municipal Police") opened fire on Chinese protesters.

NAME: [Shanghai Massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shanghai_Massacre "Shanghai Massacre")
DESCRIPTION: [KMT](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/KMT "KMT") elements carried out a full-scale purge of Communists in all areas under their control.

NAME: [Columbine Mine massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Columbine_Mine_massacre "Columbine Mine massacre") (1928)
DESCRIPTION: In a fight between Colorado state police and a striking coal miners, the police used firearms, killing six and wounding dozens. The miners claimed that machine guns were fired at them, which was denied by the state police.

NAME: [Bath School massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bath_School_disaster "Bath School disaster") (1981)
DESCRIPTION: 37 children and a 30-year-old teacher at Bathtown [elementary school](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elementary_school "Elementary school") were killed by a major explosion set off by [school board](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/School_board "School board") [treasurer](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Treasurer "Treasurer") [Andrew Kehoe](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Andrew_Kehoe "Andrew Kehoe"). About a half-hour after the explosion, Kehoe then detonated dynamite in his truck, killing himself and five others, including a fourth-grader and four adults. Also, some hours before the event, Kehoe killed his wife at their Bath Township home. This event was the deadliest mass murder in a school in United States history.

NAME: [Coniston massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coniston_massacre "Coniston massacre") (1981)
DESCRIPTION: The last known officially sanctioned massacre of [indigenous Australians](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Indigenous_Australians "Indigenous Australians") which took place in the vicinity of Coniston cattle station in the Territory of Central Australia, Australia in revenge for the death of a [dingo](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dingo "Dingo") hunter named Frederick Brooks.

NAME: [Banana Massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Banana_Massacre "Banana Massacre")
DESCRIPTION: The Banana massacre was a massacre of workers for the [United Fruit Company](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_Fruit_Company "United Fruit Company") that occurred on December 6, 1928 in the town of [Ciénaga](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ci%C3%A9naga,_Magdalena "Ciénaga, Magdalena") near [Santa Marta](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Santa_Marta "Santa Marta"), [Colombia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Colombia "Colombia"). An unknown number of workers died after the [Conservative](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Colombian_Conservative_Party "Colombian Conservative Party") government of [Miguel Abadía](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Miguel_Abad%C3%ADa_M%C3%A9ndez "Miguel Abadía Méndez") decided to send the [Colombian army](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Colombian_army "Colombian army") to end a month-long [strike](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Strike_action "Strike action") organized by the workers' [union](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trade_union "Trade union") in order to secure better working conditions. The [government of the United States of America](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Federal_government_of_the_United_States "Federal government of the United States") had threatened to invade with the [U.S. Marine Corps](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States_Marine_Corps "United States Marine Corps") if the Colombian government did not act to protect United Fruit's interests.

NAME: [Saint Valentine's Day massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Saint_Valentine%27s_Day_massacre "Saint Valentine's Day massacre")
DESCRIPTION: [Al Capone](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Al_Capone "Al Capone")'s gang shot rival gang members and their associates.

NAME: [1929 Hebron massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1929_Hebron_massacre "1929 Hebron massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Arabs kill 69 Jews after being incited by religious leaders. Survivors were relocated to Jerusalem, "leaving Hebron barren of Jews for the first time in hundreds of years."

NAME: [1929 Safed massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1929_Safed_massacre "1929 Safed massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Arabs killed 18 Jews, wounded around 40, and some 200 houses were burned and looted.

NAME: [Les Cayes massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Les_Cayes_massacre "Les Cayes massacre")
DESCRIPTION: [United States Marine Corps](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States_Marine_Corps "United States Marine Corps") troops fire upon a group of 1,500 Haitians in [Les Cayes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Les_Cayes "Les Cayes") who were protesting against the [United States occupation of Haiti](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States_occupation_of_Haiti "United States occupation of Haiti")

NAME: [Qissa Khwani bazaar massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Qissa_Khwani_bazaar_massacre "Qissa Khwani bazaar massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Soldiers of the [British Raj](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/British_Raj "British Raj") fired on unarmed non-violent protestors of the [Khudai Khidmatgar](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Khudai_Khidmatgar "Khudai Khidmatgar") with machine guns during the [Indian independence movement](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Indian_independence_movement "Indian independence movement")

NAME: [Zilan massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zilan_massacre "Zilan massacre")
DESCRIPTION: [Turkish troops](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Turkish_Armed_Forces "Turkish Armed Forces") massacred [Kurdish](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kurdish_people "Kurdish people") residents during the [Ararat rebellion](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ararat_rebellion "Ararat rebellion").

NAME: [La Matanza](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/La_Matanza "La Matanza")
DESCRIPTION: After a peasant rebellion occurred in the western [departments of El Salvador](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Departments_of_El_Salvador "Departments of El Salvador"), President [Maximiliano Hernández Martínez](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maximiliano_Hern%C3%A1ndez_Mart%C3%ADnez "Maximiliano Hernández Martínez") would order the violent repression against the rebellion, ending in an [ethnocide](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ethnocide "Ethnocide") that killed between 10,000 to 40,000 peasants and civilians, many of them from the [Pipil people](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pipil_people "Pipil people").

NAME: [Simele massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Simele_massacre "Simele massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Iraqi Army killed 3,000 Assyrian men, women and children. The massacre, amongst other things, included rape, cars running over children and bayoneting children and pregnant women.

NAME: [Ranquil massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ranquil_massacre "Ranquil massacre")
DESCRIPTION: The [Chilean Army](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chilean_Army "Chilean Army") and [Carabineros de Chile](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carabineros_de_Chile "Carabineros de Chile") assassinated 477 workers and [Mapuche](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mapuche "Mapuche") indigenous after they started a revolt.

NAME: [Gondrand massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gondrand_massacre "Gondrand massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Ethiopian soldiers acting under the orders of [Ras Imru](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Imru_Haile_Selassie "Imru Haile Selassie") attacked Italian civilians working for the [Gondrand](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gondrand "Gondrand") logistics company, killing 80 of them.

LOCATION: [Paracuellos del Jarama](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paracuellos_del_Jarama "Paracuellos del Jarama") and [Torrejón de Ardoz](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Torrej%C3%B3n_de_Ardoz "Torrejón de Ardoz"), [Spain](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spain "Spain")
NAME: [Paracuellos massacres](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paracuellos_massacres "Paracuellos massacres")
DESCRIPTION: Mass killings against right-wing civilians and soldiers perpetrated by [Republican](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_faction_(Spanish_Civil_War) "Republican faction (Spanish Civil War)") troops and militiamen.

NAME: [Ponce massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ponce_massacre "Ponce massacre")
DESCRIPTION: The Insular Police fired on unarmed [Nationalist](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Puerto_Rican_Nationalist_Party "Puerto Rican Nationalist Party") demonstrators peacefully marching to commemorate the ending of slavery in Puerto Rico. It was the biggest massacre in [Puerto Rican](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Puerto_Rico "Puerto Rico") history.

NAME: [Tungchow massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tungchow_mutiny "Tungchow mutiny")
DESCRIPTION: [East Hebei Army](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/East_Hebei_Army "East Hebei Army") massacred Japanese civilians and troops in [Tongzhou](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tongzhou_District,_Beijing "Tongzhou District, Beijing").

NAME: [Parsley massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parsley_massacre "Parsley massacre")
DESCRIPTION: The Dominican military used machetes to brutally slash people to death and decapitate thousands of [black Haitians](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Afro-Haitians "Afro-Haitians"); they also took people to the port of Montecristi, where thousands of Haitians were thrown into the ocean to drown with their hands and feet bound. Their executioners often inflicted wounds on their bodies before throwing them overboard in order to attract sharks. Survivors who managed to cross the border and return to [Haiti](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Haiti "Haiti") told stories of family members being hacked with machetes and strangled by the soldiers, and children dashed against rocks and tree trunks.

NAME: [Dersim massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dersim_massacre "Dersim massacre")
DESCRIPTION: [Turkish troops](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Turkish_Armed_Forces "Turkish Armed Forces") massacred [Alevi](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alevi "Alevi") residents during the [Dersim Rebellion](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dersim_Rebellion "Dersim Rebellion").

NAME: [Nanking Massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nanking_Massacre "Nanking Massacre")
DESCRIPTION: The [Imperial Japanese Army](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Imperial_Japanese_Army "Imperial Japanese Army") pillaged and burned [Nanking](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nanking "Nanking") while, at the same time, murdering, enslaving, raping, and torturing prisoners-of-war and civilians.

NAME: [Tsuyama massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tsuyama_massacre "Tsuyama massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Mutsuo Toi, believing he was mistreated by his neighbors and rejected by women after being diagnosed with [tuberculosis](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tuberculosis "Tuberculosis"), murdered his own grandmother and 29 of his neighbors in a [spree killing](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spree_killer "Spree killer") before shooting himself.

NAME: [Seguro Obrero massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seguro_Obrero_massacre "Seguro Obrero massacre")
DESCRIPTION: After members of the [National Socialist Movement of Chile](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/National_Socialist_Movement_of_Chile "National Socialist Movement of Chile") (nicknamed "Nacistas") attempted a coup by taking over the [Edificio del Seguro Obrero](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edificio_del_Seguro_Obrero "Edificio del Seguro Obrero"), he started a shootout with [Carabineros de Chile](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carabineros_de_Chile "Carabineros de Chile"). After the Nacistas surrendered when they were outmatched, the carabineros entered the place, and later they would group them together and shoot them.

NAME: [Częstochowa massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cz%C4%99stochowa_massacre "Częstochowa massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Polish civilians were shot, stabbed and beaten to death by soldiers of the [Wehrmacht](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wehrmacht "Wehrmacht").

NAME: [Katyn massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Katyn_massacre "Katyn massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Soviet [NKVD](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/NKVD "NKVD") executed [Polish](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Poland "Poland") intelligentsia, [POWs](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/POW "POW") and reserve officers.

LOCATION: Le Paradis village, commune of [Lestrem](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lestrem "Lestrem"), Northern France
NAME: [Le Paradis massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Le_Paradis_massacre "Le Paradis massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Soldiers of the 14th Company, S.S. Division Totenkopf, under the command of Hauptsturmführer Fritz Knöchlein shot prisoners-of-war during the Battle of France.

NAME: [Ip massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ip_massacre "Ip massacre")
DESCRIPTION: After two Hungarian soldiers died in an explosion, a detachment of the [Royal Hungarian Army](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Royal_Hungarian_Army "Royal Hungarian Army") killed between 152 and 158 ethnic Romanians, along with 16 reported deserters.

NAME: [Jilava massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jilava_massacre "Jilava massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Members of the [Iron Guard](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Iron_Guard "Iron Guard") murdered 64 political prisoners held in Jilava penitentiary.

LOCATION: [Fântâna Albă](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stary_Vovchynets "Stary Vovchynets"), [Ukrainian Soviet Socialist Republic](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ukrainian_Soviet_Socialist_Republic "Ukrainian Soviet Socialist Republic")
NAME: [Fântâna Albă massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/F%C3%A2nt%C3%A2na_Alb%C4%83_massacre "Fântâna Albă massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Ethnic [Romanians](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Romanians "Romanians") trying to cross the border from the Soviet Union into Romania were met with open fire by [Soviet Border Troops](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Soviet_Border_Troops "Soviet Border Troops").

NAME: [Gudovac massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gudovac_massacre "Gudovac massacre")
DESCRIPTION: The mass killing of around 190 Bjelovar Serbs by the Croatian nationalist [Ustaše](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Usta%C5%A1e "Ustaše")

NAME: [Glina massacres](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Glina_massacres "Glina massacres")
DESCRIPTION: The mass killings of Serb peasants by the [Ustashe](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ustashe "Ustashe") in the town of Glina, that occurred between May and August 1941

LOCATION: [Kondomari](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kondomari "Kondomari"), [Chania](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chania_(regional_unit) "Chania (regional unit)"), [Crete](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crete "Crete"), [Kingdom of Greece](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kingdom_of_Greece "Kingdom of Greece") (under German occupation)
NAME: [Massacre of Kondomari](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Massacre_of_Kondomari "Massacre of Kondomari")
DESCRIPTION: Cretan civilians were shot by an ad hoc firing squad of [German paratroopers](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fallschirmj%C3%A4ger "Fallschirmjäger") as part of a series of [reprisal](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Reprisal "Reprisal") killings.

NAME: [NKVD prisoner massacres](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/NKVD_prisoner_massacres "NKVD prisoner massacres")
DESCRIPTION: The Soviet [NKVD](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/NKVD "NKVD") executed thousands of political prisoners in the initial stages of [Operation Barbarossa](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Operation_Barbarossa "Operation Barbarossa").

NAME: [Kamianets-Podilskyi massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kamianets-Podilskyi_massacre "Kamianets-Podilskyi massacre")
DESCRIPTION: [Police Battalion 320](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Police_Battalion_320 "Police Battalion 320") and *[Einsatzgruppen](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Einsatzgruppen "Einsatzgruppen")* under [Friedrich Jeckeln](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Friedrich_Jeckeln "Friedrich Jeckeln"), assisted by Hungarian troops and members of the [Ukrainian Auxiliary Police](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ukrainian_Auxiliary_Police "Ukrainian Auxiliary Police"), wipe out the city's Jewish community.

NAME: [Medvedev Forest massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Medvedev_Forest_massacre "Medvedev Forest massacre")
DESCRIPTION: On the personal orders of [Joseph Stalin](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joseph_Stalin "Joseph Stalin"), the [NKVD](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/NKVD "NKVD") took a number of political prisoners held at [Oryol Prison](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oryol_Prison "Oryol Prison") into Medvedev Forest and shot them.

NAME: [Babi Yar massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Babi_Yar_massacre "Babi Yar massacre")
