An amateur film was released showing that, contrary to Israeli assertions, an Israeli drone was spying on the UN compound just before it was shelling. The UN concluded that the attack was intentional. [Amnesty International](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Amnesty_International "Amnesty International") also concluded, "the IDF intentionally attacked the UN compound.

NAME: [Ghulja incident](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ghulja_incident "Ghulja incident") (2006)
DESCRIPTION: After two days of protests during which the protesters had marched shouting "[God is great](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Takbir "Takbir")" and "independence for Xinjiang" the demonstrations were crushed by the [People's Liberation Army](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/People%27s_Liberation_Army "People's Liberation Army"). Official reports put the death toll at 9 while dissident reports estimated the number killed at more than 100.

NAME: [El Aro Massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/El_Aro_Massacre "El Aro Massacre")
DESCRIPTION: 15 individuals accused of being leftist supporters of [FARC](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Revolutionary_Armed_Forces_of_Colombia "Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia") were massacred by the [AUC](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_Self-Defense_Forces_of_Colombia "United Self-Defense Forces of Colombia").

NAME: [Luxor massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luxor_massacre "Luxor massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Massacre carried out by [Egyptian](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Egyptians "Egyptians") [Islamist](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Islamist "Islamist") militants, in which 64 people (including 59 visiting tourists) were killed using automatic weapons and machetes.

NAME: [Laxmanpur Bathe massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Laxmanpur_Bathe_massacre "Laxmanpur Bathe massacre")
DESCRIPTION: 58 [Dalits](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dalit "Dalit") were shot, allegedly by members of the [Ranvir Sena](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ranvir_Sena "Ranvir Sena") in retribution for mass murders perpetrated by [Maoists](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Naxalite%E2%80%93Maoist_insurgency "Naxalite-Maoist insurgency").

NAME: [Acteal massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Acteal_massacre "Acteal massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Massacre carried out by paramilitary forces of 45 people attending a prayer meeting of indigenous townspeople, who were members of the pacifist group Las Abejas ("The Bees"), in the village of Acteal, municipality of Chenalhó, in the Mexican state of Chiapas.

NAME: [Omagh bombing](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Omagh_bombing "Omagh bombing") (November 1998)
DESCRIPTION: The Omagh bombing was a car bomb attack carried out by the Real Irish Republican Army, a splinter group of former Provisional Irish Republican Army members opposed to the [Good Friday Agreement](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Good_Friday_Agreement "Good Friday Agreement"). Twenty-nine people died and approximately 220 people were injured.The attack was described by the BBC as "Northern Ireland's worst single terrorist atrocity".

NAME: [Blue Market massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blue_Market_massacre "Blue Market massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Terrorist attack of [Kurdistan Workers' Party](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kurdistan_Workers%27_Party "Kurdistan Workers' Party") (PKK) resulted in killing of 13 civilians.

NAME: [Columbine High School Massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Columbine_High_School_massacre "Columbine High School massacre") (May 1999)
DESCRIPTION: Two teenagers, [Eric Harris and Dylan Klebold](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eric_Harris_and_Dylan_Klebold "Eric Harris and Dylan Klebold") open fire on their classmates on April 20, 1999 at [Columbine High School](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Columbine_High_School "Columbine High School"), killing 12 students and a teacher and injuring 21 others before committing [suicide](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suicide "Suicide") in the school's library.

NAME: [Nanoor massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nanoor_massacre "Nanoor massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Killing of 11 landless labourers allegedly by activists of [Communist Party of India (Marxist)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Communist_Party_of_India_(Marxist) "Communist Party of India (Marxist)"), a political party in India, in Suchpur, near [Nanoor](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nanoor "Nanoor") and under Nanoor police station, in [Birbhum district](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Birbhum_district "Birbhum district") in the Indian state of [West Bengal](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/West_Bengal "West Bengal").

NAME: [Dolphinarium discotheque massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dolphinarium_discotheque_massacre "Dolphinarium discotheque massacre")
DESCRIPTION: A [Hamas](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hamas "Hamas") suicide bomber blows himself up outside a nightclub in [Tel Aviv](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tel_Aviv "Tel Aviv"), killing at least 21 teenage girls and 4 adults. The youngest victim was 14 years old, and a majority of the teenage girls were of [Russian](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russians "Russians") origin.

NAME: [Nepalese royal massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nepalese_royal_massacre "Nepalese royal massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Crown Prince [Dipendra of Nepal](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dipendra_of_Nepal "Dipendra of Nepal") kills 9 members of the Nepalese royal family in a mass shooting.

NAME: [Osaka school massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Osaka_school_massacre "Osaka school massacre")
DESCRIPTION: [Mamoru Takuma](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mamoru_Takuma "Mamoru Takuma"), an ex-[convict](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Convict "Convict") with a history of mental disturbance and anti-social behavior, entered Ikeda Elementary School and stabbed multiple children and teachers there before being subdued.

NAME: [2001 Massacre of Plaza de Mayo](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2001_Massacre_of_Plaza_de_Mayo "2001 Massacre of Plaza de Mayo")
DESCRIPTION: Members of the [Argentine Federal Police](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Argentine_Federal_Police "Argentine Federal Police") fired against a group of protesters who were protesting in the [Plaza de Mayo](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Plaza_de_Mayo "Plaza de Mayo"). As a result, 5 people were killed and 227 were injured.

NAME: [Bat Mitzvah massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bat_Mitzvah_massacre "Bat Mitzvah massacre")
DESCRIPTION: An attack carried out in January 2002 by [al-Aqsa Martyrs' Brigades](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Al-Aqsa_Martyrs%27_Brigades "Al-Aqsa Martyrs' Brigades") in which a Palestinian gunman hurling grenades killed six and wounded 33 in a [Bat Mitzvah](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bat_Mitzvah "Bat Mitzvah") celebration, a traditional Jewish celebration held for a 12-year-old girl.

NAME: [Gulbarg Society massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gulbarg_Society_massacre "Gulbarg Society massacre")
DESCRIPTION: During the [2002 Gujarat riots](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2002_Gujarat_riots "2002 Gujarat riots"), a mob attacked the Gulbarg Society, a lower middle-class [Muslim](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Muslim "Muslim") neighbourhood in Chamanpura, [Ahmedabad](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ahmedabad "Ahmedabad"). Most of the houses were burnt, and at least 35 victims including a former [Congress](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Indian_National_Congress "Indian National Congress"), [Member of Parliament](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Member_of_Parliament "Member of Parliament"), [Ehsan Jafri](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ehsan_Jafri "Ehsan Jafri"), were burnt alive, while 31 others went missing after the incident, later presumed dead, bringing the total of the dead to 69.

NAME: [Passover massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Passover_massacre "Passover massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Killing of 30 guests at the Park Hotel in Netanya, Israel, sitting down to the traditional [Passover Seder](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Passover_Seder "Passover Seder") meal. Another 143 were injured. [Hamas](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hamas "Hamas") claimed responsibility.

NAME: [Mukaradeeb wedding party massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mukaradeeb_wedding_party_massacre "Mukaradeeb wedding party massacre")
DESCRIPTION: US military shoots and bombs civilians celebrating a wedding; 42 are killed, including 13 children. US military maintains no such party was taking place at the time of the attack, but two videos, one of the party and the other of the remains taken the next day, refute the US denial.

NAME: [Beslan school hostage crisis](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beslan_school_hostage_crisis "Beslan school hostage crisis")
DESCRIPTION: Armed Chechen separatists took more than 1,200 people hostage at a school. 334 civilians were killed, including 186 school children, and hundreds wounded.

NAME: [Kareeboomvloer massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kareeboomvloer_massacre "Kareeboomvloer massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Brothers Sylvester and Gavin Beukes murder the owners' couple of farm *Kareeboomvloer* and execute all witnesses, including two children. The motive was revenge for a previous theft charge laid by the farm owner.

NAME: [Andijan massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Andijan_massacre "Andijan massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Uzbek Interior Ministry and National Security Service troops fired into a crowd of protesters.

NAME: Shafram massacre (2005)
DESCRIPTION: In protest of Ariel Sharon's government evacuation of [Gaza](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gaza_Strip "Gaza Strip") colonies, Jewish IDF deserter [Eden Natan-Zada](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eden_Natan-Zada "Eden Natan-Zada") travels to Israeli Arab city Shefa-Amr and unloads his gun against residents of a Druze neighborhood.

NAME: [Haditha massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Haditha_massacre "Haditha massacre")
DESCRIPTION: [US Marines](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/US_Marines "US Marines") slaughter 24 unarmed Iraqi civilians, among whom numerous children and the elderly. Although the unit's commander, Staff Sgt [Frank Wuterich](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frank_Wuterich "Frank Wuterich"), claimed his forces came under attack just before the rampage, no weapons were found in the area.

NAME: [Mahmudiyah massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mahmudiyah_rape_and_killings "Mahmudiyah rape and killings")
DESCRIPTION: U.S. soldiers invade Iraqi family residence; kill a father and mother and their three youngest children; rape the eldest child, Abeer Qassim Hamza al-Janabi (14); and kill her.

NAME: [Capitol Hill massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Capitol_Hill_massacre "Capitol Hill massacre")
DESCRIPTION: 28-year-old Kyle Aaron Huff entered a rave afterparty in the southeast part of Seattle's Capitol Hill neighborhood and opened fire, killing six and wounding two, before committing suicide.

NAME: [Virginia Tech massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Virginia_Tech_massacre "Virginia Tech massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Gunman [Seung-Hui Cho](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seung-Hui_Cho "Seung-Hui Cho"), killed 32 people and wounded many others before committing [suicide](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suicide "Suicide"). The [massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spree_killing "Spree killing") one of the deadliest peacetime shooting incidents by a single gunman in United States history, on or off a school campus.

NAME: [Mardin engagement ceremony massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mardin_engagement_ceremony_massacre "Mardin engagement ceremony massacre")
DESCRIPTION: The Mardin engagement ceremony massacre was a massacre carried out by Mehmet Çelebi, a village guard, at an engagement ceremony, where at least forty-four people were killed on May 4, 2009, in the village of [Bilge](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bilge,_Mardin "Bilge, Mardin") in [Mazıdağı](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maz%C4%B1da%C4%9F%C4%B1 "Mazıdağı") district of south-eastern [Mardin Province](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mardin_Province "Mardin Province") in [Turkey](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Turkey "Turkey"). The attack was perpetrated using [grenades](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grenade "Grenade") and automatic weapons by at least two masked assailants, who authorities believe are involved in a feud between two families. According to some sources it was an internal [feud](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Feud "Feud") of the [Kurdish](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kurds "Kurds") [Çelebi clan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/%C3%87elebi_clan "Çelebi clan").

NAME: [28 September massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2009_Guinea_protest "2009 Guinea protest")
DESCRIPTION: Guinean uniformed security forces opened fire on a political rally trapped in the 28 September Stadium.

NAME: [2009 Fort Hood shooting](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2009_Fort_Hood_shooting "2009 Fort Hood shooting")
DESCRIPTION: Gunman [Nidal Hasan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nidal_Hasan "Nidal Hasan"), a Major in the U.S. Army, killed 12 soldiers and one civilian, and wounded at least 30 on the base at Ft. Hood. Initial reports indicate Hassan was upset at being deployed to Iraq.

NAME: [Maguindanao massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maguindanao_massacre "Maguindanao massacre")
DESCRIPTION: A group of 100 armed men, alleged to include police and private militia led by Andal Ampatuan, Jr., stopped a convoy of five cars transporting Genalyn Tiamzon-Mangudadatu, the wife of [Esmael Mangudadatu](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Esmael_Mangudadatu "Esmael Mangudadatu"), who is running for provincial governor in the [2010 Philippine elections](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2010_Philippine_general_election "2010 Philippine general election"). She was en route to the town of [Shariff Aguak](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shariff_Aguak,_Maguindanao "Shariff Aguak, Maguindanao") to file a certificate of candidacy for her husband, accompanied by his sisters, other supporters, and members of the press. The attackers kidnapped and later killed all members of the Mangudadatu group; reports state that women in the group were raped before being killed. Five other people not part of the group, in a car behind the convoy, were also kidnapped and killed.

NAME: [2010 San Fernando massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2010_San_Fernando_massacre "2010 San Fernando massacre")
DESCRIPTION: 72 of undocumented immigrants Were killed by [Los Zetas](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Los_Zetas "Los Zetas")

NAME: [Utøya massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ut%C3%B8ya_massacre "Utøya massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Right-wing terrorist [Anders Behring Breivik](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anders_Behring_Breivik "Anders Behring Breivik") opened fire at a summer camp held by the [Workers' Youth League](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Workers%27_Youth_League_(Norway) "Workers' Youth League (Norway)") killing 69 and wounding 200 before surrendering to police. Breivik also killed eight people in a bombing in [Oslo](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oslo "Oslo") in a separate attack hours earlier.

NAME: [Uror massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ethnic_violence_in_South_Sudan#Uror_massacre_(2011) "Ethnic violence in South Sudan")
DESCRIPTION: In what was believed to be a revenge operation, members of the [Murle](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Murle_people "Murle people") tribe attacked members of the Nuer tribe, burning down over 3,400 houses and the hospital ran by [Médecins Sans Frontières](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/M%C3%A9decins_Sans_Fronti%C3%A8res "Médecins Sans Frontières"). An initial estimate showed that 38,000 heads of cattle were stolen and 208 children were kidnapped.

NAME: [Mekong River massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mekong_River_massacre "Mekong River massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Two Chinese cargo ships were attacked on a stretch of the [Mekong River](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mekong_River "Mekong River") in the [Golden Triangle](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Golden_Triangle_(Southeast_Asia) "Golden Triangle (Southeast Asia)") area. All 13 crew members were killed and dumped in the river. It is the deadliest assault on Chinese nationals abroad in modern times.

NAME: [Pibor massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pibor_massacre "Pibor massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Partly as reaction for previous massacres, the [Nuer White Army](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nuer_White_Army "Nuer White Army") released a statement stating its intention to "[wipe out](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Genocide "Genocide") the entire Murle tribe on the face of the earth as the only solution to guarantee long-term security of Nuer's cattle" and massacred members of the [Murle people](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Murle_people "Murle people").

NAME: [Kandahar massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kandahar_massacre "Kandahar massacre")
DESCRIPTION: 17 Afghan civilians were killed by U.S. Army Soldier [Robert Bales](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Bales "Robert Bales"). Some witnesses have indicated more than one person was involved.

NAME: [Houla massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Houla_massacre "Houla massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Approximately 108 people were killed with knives in the Syrian town of [Houla](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Houla "Houla"). Approximately 25 men, 49 children and 34 women were among the victims.

NAME: [Rabaa massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/August_2013_Rabaa_massacre "August 2013 Rabaa massacre")
DESCRIPTION: [Egyptian](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Egypt "Egypt") security forces and army raided two camps of [protesters](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Protest "Protest") in [Cairo](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cairo "Cairo"): one at al-Nahda Square and a larger one at [Rabaa al-Adawiya Square](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rabaa_al-Adawiya_Square "Rabaa al-Adawiya Square"). The two sites had been occupied by supporters of ousted President [Mohamed Morsi](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mohamed_Morsi "Mohamed Morsi"). Reports of fatalities range from 600 to more than 800 civilians, while at least 3,994 were injured.

NAME: [Gudele massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ethnic_violence_in_South_Sudan#Anti-Nuer_pogroms_(2013) "Ethnic violence in South Sudan")
DESCRIPTION: During the breakout of the [South Sudanese Civil War](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/South_Sudanese_Civil_War "South Sudanese Civil War"), [Dinka](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dinka_people "Dinka people") [SPLA](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sudan_People%27s_Liberation_Army "Sudan People's Liberation Army") soldiers rounded up and killed Nuer men from Nuer suburbs in the capital, Juba.

NAME: [2014 Bentiu massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2014_Bentiu_massacre "2014 Bentiu massacre")
DESCRIPTION: During the [South Sudanese Civil War](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/South_Sudanese_Civil_War "South Sudanese Civil War"), rebels massacred mostly non-[Nuer](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nuer_people "Nuer people") civilians after taking control of Bentiu.

NAME: [Sinjar massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sinjar_massacre "Sinjar massacre")
DESCRIPTION: An [ISIS](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Islamic_State_of_Iraq_and_the_Levant "Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant") massacre of [Yazidi](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yazidis "Yazidis") men.

NAME: [2014 Peshawar school massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2014_Peshawar_school_massacre "2014 Peshawar school massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Seven gunmen affiliated with the Tehrik-i-Taliban (TTP) conducted a terrorist attack on the Army Public School killing more than 150 people, including 134 schoolchildren, ranging between eight and eighteen years of age.

NAME: [Charleston church shooting](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charleston_church_shooting "Charleston church shooting") (Charleston church massacre)
DESCRIPTION: A mass shooting perpetrated by [Dylann Roof](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dylann_Roof "Dylann Roof"), a 21-year-old [white supremacist](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/White_supremacist "White supremacist"), opened fire at the [Emanuel African Methodist Episcopal Church](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emanuel_African_Methodist_Episcopal_Church "Emanuel African Methodist Episcopal Church"), killing 9.

NAME: [Bataclan massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bataclan_massacre "Bataclan massacre") (2016)
DESCRIPTION: [November 2015 Paris attacks](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/November_2015_Paris_attacks "November 2015 Paris attacks"). The single deadliest terrorist attack in French history. Multiple shooting and grenade attacks occurred on a Friday night; among the locations targeted were a music venue, sports stadium and several bar and restaurant terraces. 90 persons were killed during a siege at an [Eagles of Death Metal](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eagles_of_Death_Metal "Eagles of Death Metal") concert inside the [Bataclan](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bataclan_(theatre) "Bataclan (theatre)"). French president [François Hollande](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fran%C3%A7ois_Hollande "François Hollande") evacuated from a football match between [France](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/France_national_football_team "France national football team") and [Germany](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Germany_national_football_team "Germany national football team") at the [Stade de France](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stade_de_France "Stade de France"), slated venue for the [UEFA Euro 2016 Final](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UEFA_Euro_2016#Final "UEFA Euro 2016"), after three separate suicide bombings over the course of about 40 minutes. [ISIS](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Islamic_State_of_Iraq_and_the_Levant "Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant") claimed responsibility for the attacks and President Hollande named the Paris attacks an "act of war".

NAME: [Orlando massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Orlando_massacre "Orlando massacre")
DESCRIPTION: A mass shooting perpetrated by [Omar Mateen](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Omar_Mateen "Omar Mateen"), a 29-year-old U.S. citizen, opened fire in the Pulse Nightclub, a gay nightclub, killing 49, and injuring 50+. [ISIS](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Islamic_State_of_Iraq_and_the_Levant "Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant") claimed responsibility for the attacks. It was the worst shooting massacre by a lone perpetrator in modern U.S. history, until the [2017 Las Vegas shooting](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2017_Las_Vegas_shooting "2017 Las Vegas shooting").

NAME: [Inn Din massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Inn_Din_massacre "Inn Din massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Mass execution of [Rohingyas](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rohingya_people "Rohingya people") by the [Myanmar Army](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Myanmar_Army "Myanmar Army") and armed [Rakhine](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rakhine_people "Rakhine people") locals in the village of [Inn Din](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Inn_Din "Inn Din"), in [Rakhine State](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rakhine_State "Rakhine State"), [Myanmar](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Myanmar "Myanmar").

NAME: [Nduga massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nduga_massacre "Nduga massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Papuan separatists attacked a construction camp and took 25 construction workers hostage. The separatists took their captives to a nearby hill and proceeded to shoot them, killing 19 of them. The West Papua Liberation Army, the military arm of the [West Papua Liberation Organization](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/West_Papua_Liberation_Organization "West Papua Liberation Organization"), claimed responsibility for the attack, but claimed that the workers were in reality Indonesian soldiers disguised as civilians.

NAME: [Christchurch mosque massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christchurch_mosque_shootings "Christchurch mosque shootings")
DESCRIPTION: Australian [white supremacist](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/White_supremacy "White supremacy") Brenton Harrison Tarrant went to the [Al Noor Mosque](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Al_Noor_Mosque,_Christchurch "Al Noor Mosque, Christchurch") and the [Linwood Islamic Centre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Linwood_Islamic_Centre "Linwood Islamic Centre"), shooting at the people who were there, while broadcasting the entire event live on [Facebook](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Facebook "Facebook").

NAME: [Kharqamar incident](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kharqamar_incident "Kharqamar incident") (Khar Qamar massacre)
DESCRIPTION: Pakistan Army shot into a Pashtun protest gathering, killing more than 13 protesters and injuring over 25 others.

NAME: [Ogossagou massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ogossagou_massacre "Ogossagou massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Two villages of [Fulani herders](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fulani_herdsmen "Fulani herdsmen") in central Mali, Ogossagou and Welingara, were particularly affected during several attacks by gunmen.

NAME: [Sobane Da massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sobane_Da_massacre "Sobane Da massacre")
DESCRIPTION: The [Dogon](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dogon_people "Dogon people") village of Sobane-Kou in Mali was attacked by a suspected [Fulani](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fulani_herdsmen "Fulani herdsmen") militia group.

NAME: [El Paso massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2019_El_Paso_shooting "2019 El Paso shooting")
DESCRIPTION: White supremacist Patrick Wood Crusius commits a mass shooting at a Walmart that kills 23, mostly Hispanics.

NAME: [Lekki massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2020_Lekki_shooting "2020 Lekki shooting")
DESCRIPTION: The [Nigerian Army](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nigerian_Army "Nigerian Army") shoot at [End SARS](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/End_SARS "End SARS") protesters at the [Lekki](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lekki "Lekki") toll gate in [Lagos](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lagos_State "Lagos State"), killing 12 people.

NAME: [Aksum massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aksum_massacre "Aksum massacre")
DESCRIPTION: [Eritrean](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eritrean_Defence_Forces "Eritrean Defence Forces") soldiers attacked the city of Aksum after they were attacked by local militia loyal to the [TPLF](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/TPLF "TPLF").

NAME: [La Vega massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/La_Vega_raid "La Vega raid")
DESCRIPTION: Members of the [Venezuelan National Police](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Venezuelan_National_Police "Venezuelan National Police") (PNB), the Special Armed Forces (FAES) and the [Venezuelan National Guard](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Venezuelan_National_Guard "Venezuelan National Guard") seized control of the parish, killing a number of people in the neighborhood.

NAME: [Camargo massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Camargo_massacre "Camargo massacre")
DESCRIPTION: On 22 January 2021, 19 corpses were found in a truck in Camargo Municipality, which is in the Mexican state Tamaulipas and borders Texas in the United States. The authorities discovered two vehicles which were on fire.

NAME: [Wehda Street massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wehda_Street_massacre "Wehda Street massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Israeli forces bombed al-Wehda Street, a densely populated area located in one of Gaza's most prominent residential and commercial neighborhoods.

NAME: [Solhan and Tadaryat massacres](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solhan_and_Tadaryat_massacres "Solhan and Tadaryat massacres")
DESCRIPTION: Unknown insurgents attacked the villages of Solhan and Tadaryat, marking one of the deadliest massacres in the insurgency in Burkina Faso.

NAME: [Konya massacre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2021_Konya_massacre "2021 Konya massacre")
DESCRIPTION: Seven family members were shot.
